TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginStatus extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 检测用户的身份验证状态，将 Web 站点的链接状态切换为登录或注销。

span.span: Detects the user's authentication state and toggles the state of a link to log in to or log out of a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件有两种状态，网站，登录和注销该网站，并由属性对象的属性。The control has two states, logged in to the Web site and logged out of the Web site, determined by the property of the object's property. 控件显示的文本或图像链接，具体取决于的设置和属性。The control displays either a text or an image link, depending on the setting of the and properties. 你可以显示文本或一个或两个状态的图像。You can display either text or images for one or both states. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉的 ASP.NET 提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 用户未登录到站点时控件提供在应用程序配置设置中定义的登录页的链接。When a user is not logged in to the site, the control provides a link to the login page defined in the application configuration settings. 当用户登录到该网站，控件提供将其注销该网站的链接。When the user is logged in to the Web site, the control provides a link to log out of the Web site. 从网站注销的日志记录清除用户的身份验证状态和时使用 cookie 将清除从用户的客户端计算机的 cookie。Logging out of the Web site clears the user's authentication status and when using cookies will clear the cookie from the user's client computer. 该网站，任何后续访问控件将显示登录提示。On any subsequent visit to the Web site, the control will display the prompt to log in. 注销行为由控制属性，用于指定是否刷新当前页面、 将用户重定向至登录页定义在应用程序配置设置中，或将用户重定向到指定的页面属性。The logout behavior is controlled by the property, which specifies whether to refresh the current page, redirect the user to the login page defined in the application configuration settings, or redirect the user to a page specified by the property. 默认值为若要刷新当前页面。The default is to refresh the current page. > [!NOTE] > 当用户使用控件注销网站、 所有数据视图中都显示状态和所有 post 数据都都将丢失。When a user uses the control to log out of a Web site, all data present in view state and all post data is lost. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ```

summary.span: 创建构成 控件的子控件。

span.span: Creates the child controls that make up the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生从自定义控件时，主要由控件开发人员使用此成员类。This member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the class. 通知使用基于撰写的实现，包括派生的控件的任何控件的 ASP.NET 基础结构调用此方法和，若要创建任何子控件它们包含在准备回发或呈现。This method is called by the ASP.NET infrastructure to notify any controls that use composition-based implementation, including controls that derive from and , to create any child controls they contain in preparation for postback or rendering.

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler LoggedOut;
.event class System.EventHandler LoggedOut
Public Custom Event LoggedOut As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ LoggedOut;

summary.span: 在用户单击注销链接并且注销过程完成后引发。

span.span: Raised after the user clicks the logout link and the logout process is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之后用户单击注销链接并完成注销过程后，事件将在服务器上中引发。The event is raised on the server after the user clicks the logout link and the logout process is complete. 当用户单击注销链接，引发事件时，然后运行该注销过程，最后引发事件。When the user clicks the logout link, the event is raised, then the logout process is run, and finally the event is raised. 使用事件，以便提供附加处理，例如清理数据库连接或删除每个用户在用户登录出的 Web 站点之后缓存数据。Use the event to provide additional processing such as cleaning up database connections or removing per-user cached data after the user logs out of a Web site. 用户的标识是否时仍然可用执行事件。The user's identity is still available while the event is executing. 如果你处理程序事件将客户端浏览器重定向到另一页，将清除客户端中的身份验证 cookie。If your handler for the event redirects the client browser to another page, the authentication cookie will be cleared from the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将附加到事件处理程序事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 事件处理程序在此示例中为空。The event handler in this example is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/CS/loginstatusafterlogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/VB/loginstatusafterlogoutvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventHandler LoggingOut;
.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventHandler LoggingOut
Public Custom Event LoggingOut As LoginCancelEventHandler
public: event System::Web::UI::WebControls::LoginCancelEventHandler ^ LoggingOut;

summary.span: 在用户单击注销按钮时引发。

span.span: Raised when the user clicks the logout button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时将引发事件的服务器上用户单击注销链接。The event is raised on the server when the user clicks the logout link. 注销过程不会引发此事件之后才, 且用户信息仍然可用。The logout process does not occur until after this event, and user information is still available. 事件可用于取消注销过程，如果用户在离开该网站，如购买购物车中的项或将更改提交到数据库之前必须完成的活动。The event allows you to cancel the logout process if the user must complete an activity before leaving the Web site, such as purchasing items in a shopping cart or submitting changes to a database. 你可以取消事件通过设置属性参数`true`。You can cancel the event by setting the property of the parameter to `true`. 使用事件，以便提供额外的处理，如之前在用户从网站注销清除每个用户数据。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as clearing per-user data, before a user logs out of a site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将附加到事件处理程序事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 事件处理程序更新窗体上的字段，然后取消注销尝试。The event handler updates a field on the form, and then cancels the logout attempt. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/CS/loginstatusbeforelogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/VB/loginstatusbeforelogoutvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string LoginImageUrl

public: virtual property System::String ^ LoginImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于登录链接的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the image used for the login link.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含用于登录链接的图像的 URL。

span.span: A string containing the URL of the image used for the login link.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用于登录链接的图像的位置。The property contains the location of the image used for the login link. 属性用作图像的替换文字。The property is used as the alternative text for the image. 如果为空，属性呈现为链接。If is empty, the property is rendered as the link. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置到特定映像的属性。The following code example shows how to set the property to a specific image. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLoginImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginImageUrl/CS/loginstatusloginimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLoginImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginImageUrl/VB/loginstatusloginimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string LoginText
Public Overridable Property LoginText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ LoginText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于登录链接的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text used for the login link.

value.span: 显示为登录链接的字符串。

span.span: A string displayed as the login link.
The default is "Login".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性显示为链接文本时属性为空。The property is displayed as the link text when the property is empty. 当属性包含一个链接，属性用作图像的替换文字。When the property contains a link, the property is used as the alternative text for the image. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性。The following code example shows how to set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLoginText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginText/CS/loginstatuslogintextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLoginText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginText/VB/loginstatuslogintextvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.LogoutAction LogoutAction { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LogoutAction LogoutAction
Public Overridable Property LogoutAction As LogoutAction
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::LogoutAction LogoutAction { System::Web::UI::WebControls::LogoutAction get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::LogoutAction value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于确定在用户使用 控件从网站注销时所执行的操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the action taken when a user logs out of a Web site with the control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定向用户显示的页，他或她注销时使用控件。The property determines which page is presented to the user when he or she logs out using the control. 下表描述了为每个执行的操作值。The following table describes the actions taken for each value. | 值 value|执行操作Action taken| |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------| ||将用户重定向到的 URL 中包含属性。Redirects the user to the URL contained in the property. 如果是空的用户重定向至登录页的应用程序配置设置中定义。If is empty, the user is redirected to the login page defined in the application configuration settings.| ||将用户重定向至登录页的应用程序配置设置中定义。Redirects the user to the login page defined in the application configuration settings.| ||刷新当前页。Refreshes the current page.| 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性值以发送到登录页的用户。The following code example sets the property to the value to send the user to the login page. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLogoutAction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutAction/CS/loginstatuslogoutactioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLogoutAction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutAction/VB/loginstatuslogoutactionvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 该属性设置为无效的 值。

span.span: The property is set to an invalid value.

summary.span: 获取或设置注销页的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the logout page.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含注销页的 URL。

span.span: A string containing the URL of the logout page.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，用户将重定向到的 URL 中包含。When the property is set to , the user is redirected to the URL contained in . 如果设置为任何其他值的内容属性将被忽略。If is set to any other value, the contents of the property are ignored. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置注销页属性和属性以便时注销重定向用户。The following code example sets the property to a logout page and the property to so that the user is redirected when logging out. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl/CS/loginstatuslogoutpageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl/VB/loginstatuslogoutpageurlvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the text used for the logout link.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串显示为注销链接。

span.span: A string displayed as the logout link.
The default is "Logout".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示属性时属性为空。The property is displayed when the property is empty. 当属性包含一个链接，属性用作中不支持图像的浏览器的图像的替换文字。When the property contains a link, the property is used as the alternative text for the image in browsers that do not support images. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性。The following code example shows how to set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLogoutText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutText/CS/loginstatuslogouttextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLogoutText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutText/VB/loginstatuslogouttextvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 在用户单击注销链接并且注销处理完成后引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event after the user clicks the logout link and logout processing is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件，以便提供额外的处理，如关闭数据库连接或清理每用户缓存的数据，用户已从网站注销后。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as closing database connections or cleaning up per-user cached data, after the user has logged out of a Web site. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将附加到事件处理程序事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 事件处理程序在此示例中为空。The event handler in this example is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/CS/loginstatusafterlogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/VB/loginstatusafterlogoutvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: A that contains event data.

summary.span: 在用户单击 控件上的注销链接时将引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when a user clicks the logout link on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件，以便提供额外的处理，如之前在用户从网站注销清理每用户数据。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as cleaning up per-user data, before a user logs out of a site. 可以取消事件，因此可以为用户提供的在离开 Web 站点之前保存数据，例如购物车或数据库更改的选项。The event can be canceled, so you can give the user the option of saving data such as a shopping cart or database changes before leaving the Web site. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将附加到事件处理程序事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 事件处理程序更新窗体上的字段，然后取消注销尝试。The event handler updates a field on the form, and then cancels the logout attempt. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/CS/loginstatusbeforelogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/VB/loginstatusbeforelogoutvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: An containing the event data.

summary.span: 确定用户是否已登录，并获取登录页的 URL。

span.span: Determines whether a user is logged in, and gets the URL of the login page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否用户记录通过检查属性对象的属性。The method determines whether the user is logged in by examining the property of the object's property. 如果用户已登录，或属性用于呈现控件。If the user is logged in, the or property is used to render the control. 如果用户未登录，或属性用于呈现控件。If the user is not logged in, the or property is used to render the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 一个 对象，表示向客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

span.span: A object that represents the output stream that renders HTML content to the client.

summary.span: 将 控件呈现给指定的 控件。

span.span: Renders the control to the specified control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void RenderContents (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 一个 对象，表示向客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

span.span: A object that represents the output stream that renders HTML content to the client.

summary.span: 将控件的内容呈现到指定的编写器中。

span.span: Renders the contents of the control to the specified writer.

summary.span: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

span.span: This method is used primarily by control developers.

.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag TagKey
Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property TagKey As HtmlTextWriterTag

summary.span: 获取 控件的 值。

span.span: Gets the value for the control.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许要写入的相应 HTML 标记的输出流控件。The property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML markup for the control. 属性主要由控件开发人员使用。The property is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 你可以重写此属性指定的要使用为您派生的控件的值。

span.span: You can override this property to specify which value to use for your derived control.
